mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select m.idx,m.name,m.joindate from member m inner join companymember c on m.idx=c.member_idx where m.status ='대기' and m.user_category='기업' order by idx desc )a )b where rnum >=#{start} and rnum <=#{end}
select count(*) from member where status='대기' and user_category='기업'
select * from member m inner join companymember c on m.idx=c.member_idx where m.idx=#{idx}
